abstract: The announcement supplied Wall Street with the biggest missing piece in Boston Scientific’s strategy for meeting its promises to cut expenses and increase profits.
snippet: The announcement supplied Wall Street with the biggest missing piece in Boston Scientific’s strategy for meeting its promises to cut expenses and increase profits.
lead_paragraph: Boston Scientific said yesterday that it would lay off 2,300 employees, or 13 percent of its work force, by the end of 2008.

headline.main: Boston Scientific to Lay Off 2,300 by the End of 2008
headline.print_headline: Boston Scientific to Lay Off 2,300 by the End of 2008
